attributes.action: Reduce the extortionate UK naturalisation fees for long-term UK taxpayers
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2018/jun/24/reduce-home-office-fees-say-mps-campaigners

https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-london-42771667

The fees are causing undue hardship to families and individuals.
attributes.background:
The Home Office is charging extremely high fees for naturalisation that sometimes run into thousands of pounds. The fees have been increasing at an unsustainable pace since 2010 and now cause real hardship for people. 

Those seeking naturalisation often already contributed a fair amount in taxes.
